com.soa.fw.transform

Class SOATransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.transform.Transformer
      • com.soa.fw.transform.SOATransformer

  • public class SOATransformer
extends javax.xml.transform.Transformer
    Transformer extension that performs optimizations and ensures StreamSources do not get exhausted or closed during transformation.
    Since:
    6.0

      Use for XSLT.
